member.name: T:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest
member.summary: Represents a request for uploading and processing an image associated with a movie. This class encapsulates all necessary parameters for image upload, including file data, movie association, image metadata, and processing options like resizing and format conversion.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.MovieId
member.summary: The ID of the movie the image is associated with.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.AltText
member.summary: Alternative text describing the image for accessibility and SEO.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.IsPrimary
member.summary: Indicates whether this image is the primary image for the movie.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.Width
member.summary: Optional width (in pixels) to resize the image to.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.Height
member.summary: Optional height (in pixels) to resize the image to.

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.Quality
member.summary: The quality setting for the image (e.g., "auto", "80", etc.).

member.name: P:Movies.Application.DTOs.Requests.ImageUploadRequest.Format
member.summary: The desired output format of the image (e.g., "webp", "jpg").
